entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Low 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
